description:
BLACK TORTOISE - PART 1
It’s impossible to have too much Pop Team Epic. Popuko and Pipimi are here to inject even more unapologetic surrealist comedy directly into your synapses!
BLACK TORTOISE - PART 2
You thought the last episode was the final one? No way, it’s not over until Popuko and Pipimi say it’s over! Let the next episode commence!
Source: crunchyroll
